snippet: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits to lead Toronto, the leaders of the A.L. East.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays defeat Detroit Tigers, 8-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits to lead Toronto, the leaders of the A.L. East.

headline.main: Blue Jays Defeat Tigers in a Clash of A.L. Division Leaders
headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Defeat Tigers in a Clash of A.L. Division Leaders
